title: Summer Monteys-Fullam drops another major hint she's heading into I'm A Celebrity jungle
text:
Get the biggest I'm a Celebrity stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Paul Hollywood's ex Summer Monteys-Fullam has dropped a hint that she will be heading into I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out Of Here!

The 24-year old had already been rumoured to be appearing on the forthcoming series of the show.

And now she has uploaded a photo of her posing in a brown belted mini dress which was reminiscent of traditional safari clothing.

She captioned the post "Safari vibes" as she posed in perspex wedge heels, her hair pulled up into a ponytail on the top of her head.

Summer also added a leopard emoji.

(Image: Instagram)

Among her many hashtags on the bottom the post were: #redhead #mebeingme #thisisme #whatyouseeiswhatyouget #positivevibes #summerisntoveryet

#myoutfittoday #glamwomen #havingfuninthesun #laughs #giggles #funtimes #fullfringe #nonegativevibes .

The former barmaid has previously denied the ITV show has got in contact with her.

She said on Instagram : "Just to set the record straight… I have never contacted or been contacted by the celebrity jungle.

(Image: GC Images)

"Neither have I accepted, received or rejected any offers.

"Have a great day."

However, she liked a comment from a follower that said "Hope rumours are true and this beautiful lady is on I’m a celebrity this year. You’ve got my support and vote."

A source also told the Mail On Sunday that she intends to use I'm A Celebrity as a career springboard.

"Summer is the person to sign up right now and she is keen to get herself on television," said the insider.

(Image: SOPA Images/LightRocket via Gett)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

"Obviously I'm A Celebrity would be her top prize.

"The six-figure sum and the exposure is the biggest you'd get anywhere but she also wants to work on her own ideas.

"She's a bright girl and she has some thoughts on her own shows so it's very much a case of watch this space."

Also rumoured to be heading into the jungle are Nadine Coyle, Jamie Laing, Kym Marsh, Olivia Attwood , Richard Madeley, and Maura Higgins.
description: The former barmaid has left fans wondering once again if she's heading down under
